_sText: de_synthesis - the synthesis of old and new buildings Half of the terrorists wants try to destroy a modern bridge, the other half prefers an old castle tower. They are still arguing each other. The local police rather wants to enjoy the view from the tower and use the bridge to get to a restourant. The 3 main routes provide a lot of options to approach. They are suitable few players as well as many players. The Ts can easily switch to another bomb target. So the bomb is planted often. To give the CT a fair chance, the bomb spots are not that hard to capture and CTs have 2 rather short paths between the bomb spots. Furthermore I tried to make it grenade friendly. It Provides 64 spawn points. Thanks for constructive feedback. Don't edit without permission. Changes Gameplay: -removed mall entrance at the old street -removed 2nd "big flowerpot" -changed allay at the dust building (no ladder) -pedestrian tunnel is now blocked -changed old street: Made it harder to approach on the small "wall" and easiert to use the street -rearanged the path from CT spawn to B -enlarged tower entrance -balcony at old street is now blocked Optic: -replaced many buildings -changed CT cpawn to a street -addad 7 soundscapes -optimized more -addad a weak HDR -updated colored map overview - now with half transparency -much more Detail Published 11.10.2010.
